definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House

sentences.english: Researches on the two-photon photopolymerization technology of a Zr-based inorganic-organic hybrid material have been processed.

sentences.english: We drink whisky mixed with beer.
sentences.chinese: 我們喝摻有啤酒的威士忌。

sentences.english: The abrasion resistance of air entraining concrete has little changes when salts added into concrete.

sentences.english: Non aromatic blending oils help promote the formation of the second liquid phases.
sentences.chinese: 非芳香性液相摻兌物促進第二液相的形成。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo recognize the method of adulterating and preparation process of Pangolin adulterated with sulphate magnesium.

sentences.english: Ternary tungsten-tellurite glass system was researched in this paper.

sentences.english: A two-stage broadband erbium-doped fiber based amplified spontaneous emission(ASE) source is presented.

sentences.english: Experiment of the double-clad Yb-doped fiber amplifiers is discussed.

sentences.english: A laser-diode-pumped Nd:FAP laser oscillator is reported in this paper.

sentences.english: The changing mechanism of specific resistance of CBCM, mixed with electric admixtures, was also researched.

sentences.english: It was mixed every day into the pigs’ mash.
sentences.chinese: 它每天都被摻在豬飼料裏。

sentences.english: If it please Your Grace, we want no part of him.
sentences.chinese: 若陛下恩准，我們可不想他摻一腳。
